cards.description:
DT_Characters is a repository inside of Rebellious Takeover that gives the information for all characters. This includes an outfit system that dynamically adds Skeletal Meshes to BP_ModularCharacter and makes them morph alongside the base mesh that is also provided there.
Each skeletal mesh can have it's own morph targets modified and have it's own skin mask.

Each outfit has special properties and can be listed in an array.
